activities:
Rainmaker Systems, Inc., is a worldwide marketing and sales solutions company that provides integrated, multi-channel communications strategies, on demand technology platforms and complete data analytics to help achieve revenue goals for companies (“Clients”) worldwide across a variety of industries

We receive and collect personally identifiable information – such as name, telephone numbers, e-mail addresses, and postal addresses – from visitors to this Site when they (i) submit inquiries or requests to us, (ii) become registered users of this Site, (iii) sign up to receive newsletters or bulletins from us, or (iv) choose to provide information to us for some other reason. Any personally identifiable information provided will be used by us or our service providers or vendors in connection with providing services for visitors and in order to process any requests or inquiries that they initiate.  Our service providers or vendors may not use visitor information for their own marketing purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, we agree to dispute resolution using BBB EU SAFE HARBOR as a third party resolution provider, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus.

You can also contact the Council of Better Business Bureaus at:

Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc.
BBB EU SAFE HARBOR
3033 Wilson Boulevard, Suite 600
Arlington, VA 22201 U.S.A.
Phone: 703-276-0100
